prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with a sleek black body and striking red accents.
Show me a bipedal creature resembling a wolf, featuring unique facial markings.
Imagine a Pokemon with an urban habitat that blends into the city landscape.
Design a Pokemon that embodies a rebellious nature, with sharp claws and a fierce pose.
Generate a creature with a tough exterior and a cunning personality, set in a forest.
Give me a bipedal Pokemon that showcases agility and strength, perfect for urban battles.
Make a fierce-looking Pokemon with a striking contrast of colors for an eye-catching design.
